"・Use Photon Arts or full complete

・Use a Photon Art with <%PhotonArts>"

"Class Skill [Partizan Gear]
This is a skill to increase the performance of your partizan weapon.

By using Photon Arts and fully completing normal attacks, your gear will rise and accumulate charges.

When using Photon Arts, a gear charge is consumed in exchange for increasing the power or range of the Photon Art."
